results.title: Anaesthetic management of coronary artery bypass grafting in a patient with central core disease and susceptibility to malignant hyperthermia on statin therapy.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Myopathy_Central_Core @DISEASE_MESH:D020512 @@@Central core disease@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Malignant_Hyperthermia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008305 @@@malignant hyperthermia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Malignant_Hyperthermia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008305 @@@MH@@@) are both associated with mutations in the @GENE_RYR1 @GENE_6261 @@@RYR1@@@ gene.

citations.NLM: Johi RR, Mills R, Halsall PJ, Hopkins PM. Anaesthetic management of coronary artery bypass grafting in a patient with central core disease and susceptibility to malignant hyperthermia on statin therapy. Br J Anaesth. 2003 Nov;91(5):744-7. PMID: 14570802
